content.prompt: In the geographical region, the evolution in form from earlier tombs to the architectural complex shown most likely resulted from a desire to

choices.label: emulate the monumental tombs of foreign rulers
innovate by using new materials to ease the process of creating such buildings
provide space for an army to protect the ruler in the afterlife
heighten the symbolic association with the Sun

topic.text: 2.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Ancient Mediterranean Art
